name: 鸡肉哥哥 Chicken Brother
description:
Exploring in the huge sinkhole, you can transform from a chicken to a muscle man, by jumping, gliding and climbing from the bottom of the sinkhole to the outside world. In the process of exploration, you will meet other friends living in the sinkhole, discover a variety of treasures, and gradually understand the history of the game world.

Key Features

  • Explore all parts of the scene as you wish. There's more than one path, and more than one way to do it.
  • Hilarious transformation mechanics. Transforming into a muscle man will have additional mechanics.
  • A variety of collectibles. Your collecting fetish will be satisfied to the fullest.
  • Fun interactions with NPCs. You are not alone!
  • Illustration-like rendering style. Highly recommended for players who like stylized art.
